timeline.message: fix: lint error on local test

timeline.bodyText:
I would translate the Then by Puis and also I think the verbs should be conjuged (sélectonnez VS sélectionner) ?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              "Please select criteria in the search bar. Then, click the search button.": "S'il vous plaît sélectionner un critère dans la barre de recherche. Et, cliquer sur le bouton de recherche",
          
          
            
              "Please select criteria in the search bar. Then, click the search button.": "S'il vous plaît sélectionnez un critère dans la barre de recherche. Puis cliquez sur le bouton de recherche.",
timeline.author: ImFlog
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,36 @@
+{
+  "1 Result": "1 Résultat",
+  "Address": "Adresse",
+  "Annotations": "Annotations",
+  "Archive Trace": "Trace Archivée",
+  "Dependencies": "Dépendances",
+  "Depth": "Profondeur",
+  "Download JSON": "Télécharger JSON",
+  "Duration": "Durée",
+  "End Time": "Fin",
+  "Find a trace": "Trouver une trace",
+  "Limit": "Limite",
+  "None": "Aucun",
+  "Parent ID": "ID Parent",
+  "Please select criteria in the search bar. Then, click the search button.": "S'il vous plaît sélectionner un critère dans la barre de recherche. Et, cliquer sur le bouton de recherche",

replies.bodyText: Agree with you for the verbs, and replace "Et" by "Puis" 👍
replies.author: jufab

timeline.bodyText: Should the span word be translated ? I think section (I've actually never find a good translation).
timeline.author: ImFlog

+  "Searching has been disabled via the searchEnabled property. You can still view specific traces of which you know the trace id by entering it in the \"Trace ID...\" textbox on the top-right.": "La recherche a été désactivée via la propriété searchEnabled. Vous pouvez toujours afficher des traces spécifiques dont vous connaissez l'identifiant de trace en le saisissant dans la zone de texte \"ID Trace ... \" en haut à droite.",
+  "Services": "Services",
+  "Span ID": "ID Section",

replies.bodyText:
I agree with you, I would like to conserve span too but I want to translate all terms...
I saw Spanish translation who use "section" and I use the same idea.
replies.author: jufab

timeline.bodyText: I think the capital letters are not needed here ? Not done for the other languages.
timeline.author: ImFlog

replies.bodyText:
At first, I translated by " Rechercher les dépendances" but after use UI, I replaced by "Rechercher des dépendances"...
I have doubt about use "les" ou "des" but I'm going to follow your idea
replies.author: jufab
